think_procedure.step2: Understand the normal operation of 'seq_page_cost', which is to set the planner's estimate of the cost of a disk page fetch.
think_procedure.step3: Check if 'seq_page_cost' has any special values that alter its normal operation significantly.
think_procedure.step4: Determine if setting 'seq_page_cost' to a specific value (e.g., -1 or 0) disables a feature or changes its behavior drastically.
think_procedure.step5: Conclude whether 'seq_page_cost' is a 'special knob' based on the findings.
